title: [Large-Scale] Asynchronous Online Education Program for Strengthening Nursing and Midwifery Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Theoretical Knowledge in Nursing and Midwifery
context.additional_context: Asynchronous online education program for nurses/midwives in medical institutions to strengthen practical competencies. Accessible via personal devices with project-based assessments measuring application skills

learning_goals: Perform core nursing and midwifery practical procedures with over 90% accuracy through LMS learning modules
Exchange practical questions with peer learners and experts twice or more weekly via asynchronous discussion forums
Analyze real clinical cases in the final project, propose improvements, and achieve 80+ points through peer evaluation

resources: LMS Platform (Video, Quiz, Discussion Board Features)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
